Container.Name: Internxt-CLI-WebDAV
Container.Overview: This container provides a stable and configurable WebDAV server for your Internxt Drive, built from the official Internxt CLI. It allows you to use tools like rclone to access your files. Created for the Unraid community.

Config.Name: IP Address
Config.Description: Enter a static IP for your container here.

Config.Name: WebDAV Port
Config.Description: The port for the WebDAV service. Should not be changed.

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: This is where the container stores its persistent configuration file.
